basic.description: This seminar introduces students to theories, methods and philosophies of  qualitative inquiry in sport and physical culture, including cultural studies, ethnography, narrative inquiry, researcher subjectivity, and the politics of evidence. Students develop an in-depth understanding of the art and  practice of interpretation as it relates to qualitative approaches to research in sport management and related fields.
basic.subject: SPM
basic.title: Qualitative Inquiry in Sport and Physical Culture
